DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate incretin effect woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) removal insulin resistance metformin . The investigator ' hypothesis insulin resistant woman PCOS reduce incretin effect elevate glucagon response measure 75-g oral glucose tolerance test isoglycemic i.v . glucose infusion . The investigator hypothesise improve insulin resistance remove .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria PCOSwomen : Diagnosed PCOS accord Rotterdam criterion 18 year old BMI le 30 kg/m2 Normal glucose tolerance fast plasma glucose ( assessed 75g OGTT ) Negative GAD65 islet cell autoantibody Insulin resistant accord HOMAIR informed consent Inclusion Criteria healthy woman : 18 year old BMI le 30 kg/m2 Normal glucose tolerance fast plasma glucose ( assessed 75g OGTT ) Negative GAD65 islet cell autoantibody inform consent regular menstrual cycle ( 2835 day ) Plasma androgen level within reference level Exclusion Criteria PCOS healthy woman : First second degree relative diabetes pregnancy breast feed treatment medication influence glucose metabolism ( incl hormonal contraception ) Congenital diseases cause hyperandrogenism irregular bleed Known adrenal hyperplasia Known hyperprolaktinemia Alcohol consumption 20 gram day Hemoglobin le 7.8 %
